pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kidney-Related Functions for Clinical and Epidemiological Research // Contains kidney care oriented functions. Current version contains functions for calculation of: - Estimated glomerular filtration rate by CKD-EPI (2021 and 2009), MDRD, CKiD, FAS, EKFC, etc. - Kidney Donor Risk Index and Kidney Donor Profile Index for kidney transplant donors. - Citation: Bikbov B. kidney.epi: Kidney-Related Functions for Clinical and Epidemiological Research. Scientific-Tools.Org, https://Scientific-Tools.Org. doi:10.32614/CRAN.package.kidney.epi.
